brief_description.0: High-fidelity wireless earbuds with noise-canceling technology and long battery life.
brief_description.1: A stylish smartwatch with fitness tracking and heart rate monitoring.
brief_description.2: A 1.7-liter electric kettle with rapid boil technology and auto shut-off feature.
brief_description.3: A high-performance gaming laptop with a powerful GPU and fast refresh rate display.
brief_description.4: A non-slip, eco-friendly yoga mat with cushioning for comfort.
brief_description.5: A professional-grade DSLR camera with high resolution and fast autofocus.
brief_description.6: A high-speed blender with multiple settings and a durable glass jar.
brief_description.7: Lightweight and breathable running shoes with superior cushioning.
brief_description.8: A programmable coffee maker with a built-in grinder and multiple brew settings.
brief_description.9: A powerful hair dryer with ionic technology and multiple heat settings.

reference_descriptions.0: Experience the ultimate in wireless freedom with our high-fidelity earbuds. Featuring noise-canceling technology and up to 20 hours of battery life, these earbuds are perfect for music lovers on the go.|Our wireless earbuds offer superior sound quality and comfort. With easy touch controls and a sleek design, enjoy your favorite tunes anytime, anywhere.
reference_descriptions.1: Stay connected and track your fitness goals with our latest smartwatch. Featuring heart rate monitoring, step counting, and notifications, it's the perfect companion for an active lifestyle.|Our smartwatch combines style and functionality. Monitor your heart rate, track your steps, and receive notifications directly on your wrist.
reference_descriptions.2: Boil water quickly and safely with our 1.7-liter electric kettle. Featuring rapid boil technology and an auto shut-off feature, it's perfect for any kitchen.|Our electric kettle combines speed and safety. With a 1.7-liter capacity, rapid boil technology, and auto shut-off, it's ideal for all your hot beverage needs.
reference_descriptions.3: Unleash your gaming potential with our high-performance gaming laptop. Equipped with a powerful GPU and a fast refresh rate display, it delivers smooth and immersive gameplay.|Experience next-level gaming with our advanced gaming laptop. Featuring a cutting-edge GPU and a high refresh rate screen, it's designed for serious gamers.
reference_descriptions.4: Enhance your yoga practice with our eco-friendly, non-slip yoga mat. With superior cushioning, it provides comfort and stability for all poses.|Our yoga mat offers a perfect balance of comfort and grip. Made from eco-friendly materials, it's designed to support your practice with non-slip stability and plush cushioning.
reference_descriptions.5: Capture stunning photos with our professional-grade DSLR camera. Featuring high resolution and fast autofocus, it's perfect for both amateurs and professionals.|Take your photography to the next level with our DSLR camera. With exceptional resolution and rapid autofocus, it's ideal for capturing every moment with clarity.
reference_descriptions.6: Blend smoothies, soups, and more with our high-speed blender. Featuring multiple settings and a durable glass jar, it's a versatile addition to any kitchen.|Our high-speed blender is designed for performance and durability. With a variety of settings and a sturdy glass jar, it can handle all your blending needs.
reference_descriptions.7: Run comfortably with our lightweight and breathable running shoes. Featuring superior cushioning, they provide excellent support for long distances.|Experience comfort and performance with our running shoes. Designed for breathability and cushioning, they're perfect for runners of all levels.
reference_descriptions.8: Enjoy fresh coffee every morning with our programmable coffee maker. With a built-in grinder and multiple brew settings, it's easy to make the perfect cup.|Our coffee maker combines convenience and quality. Featuring a built-in grinder and customizable brew options, it ensures a fresh and delicious coffee experience.
reference_descriptions.9: Dry and style your hair quickly with our powerful hair dryer. Featuring ionic technology and multiple heat settings, it reduces frizz and enhances shine.|Our hair dryer offers salon-quality results at home. With advanced ionic technology and adjustable heat settings, it provides smooth and shiny hair with every use.
